metadata.comments: This playbook will generate notification email with detailed security alerts
metadata.author: simonxin

metadata.displayName: Target Log Analytics workspace resource group
metadata.description: Target Log Analytics workspace resource group

metadata.displayName: Target azure automation account resource group
metadata.description: Target azure automation account resource group
azure automation account name used for security rule polling
runbook registeredruletype variable which is used to control the allowable categories

metadata.displayName: interval minutes for logic app execution
metadata.description: interval minutes for logic app execution which will do: 1) trigger notification alerts if there is new alert within time interval 2) start new security rule polling

metadata.displayName: runbook execution initial start time (UTC time)
metadata.description: runbook execution initial start time (UTC time)

content.json:
## Sentinel Insights Query report 
---

This page is used to show scheduled hunting query report

links.linkLabel: Exploration by host or local IP

content.query:
sentinelscanreport_CL 
 | where type_s =~ "Detection"
 | where count_d != 0
 | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 4h), rulename_s
 | render columnchart
content.title: Detection Rules triggered per 4 hours

content.query:
sentinelscanreport_CL 
 | where type_s =~ "Detection"
 | where count_d != 0
 | project rulename_s,type_s, query_s, description_s, severity_s, Category, Id = pid_s, TimeGenerated
 | extend ['Rule Name'] = rulename_s, Query =  query_s, Description = description_s, Severity = ['severity_s']
 | extend severitylevel = iff(Severity=~'High',1,iff(Severity=~'Medium',2,3))
 | extend ['Rule Category'] = Category
 | order by severitylevel asc
 | project Severity, ['Rule Name'], ['Trigger Time'] = TimeGenerated,['Rule Category'], Query, Description, severitylevel, Id
content.title: Security Rule triggered

content.query:
sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where pid_s =~ "{Id}"
| join 
(sentinelscanreportdetails_CL) on $left.pid_s==$right.pid_s
| project details = todynamic(details_s)
| evaluate bag_unpack(details)
| extend HostCustomEntity =column_ifexists('HostCustomEntity', ''), IPCustomEntity =  column_ifexists('IPCustomEntity', ''), AccountCustomEntity = column_ifexists('AccountCustomEntity', ''), SubscriptionId = column_ifexists('SubscriptionId', ''),ResourceId =  column_ifexists('ResourceId', '')
| join kind=leftouter ( 
Heartbeat | distinct Computer, _ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| project omsagent = Computer, omsagent_resourceId = _ResourceId, omsagent_subscriptionId = SubscriptionId
) on $left.HostCustomEntity == $right.omsagent
| extend ResourceId = iff(tostring(ResourceId)<>'',tostring(ResourceId), omsagent_resourceId), SubscriptionId = iff(tostring(SubscriptionId)<>'',tostring(SubscriptionId), omsagent_subscriptionId)
content.title: Selected rule query details
hunting rules which to look for more security logs details

items.name: hunting rules which to look for more security logs details

content.query:
let ipaddress = '{ipaddress}';
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> ''
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where PublicIPAddress =~ ipaddress
| summarize Calls = count() by SrcIP_s, DestIP_s , PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s, FlowDirection_s
| project Calls, SourceIP = iff(SrcIP_s<>'',SrcIP_s,PublicIPAddress), DestinationIP = iff(DestIP_s<>'',DestIP_s,PublicIPAddress), Protocol = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')') ,Directory = iff(FlowDirection_s=='I','In','Out'), Statis = iff(FlowStatus_s=='A','Allowed','Denied')
| top 100 by Calls desc
content.title: Traffic Analytics for public IP Address

content.query:
let ipaddress = '{ipaddress}';
let maxnode = 10;
let outtointernet = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> '' and FlowDirection_s == 'O' and FlowStatus_s=='A'
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where PublicIPAddress =~ ipaddress and PublicIPAddress <> SrcIP_s
| summarize Calls = count() by SrcIP_s, PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s
| project sourceIp = SrcIP_s, targetIP = PublicIPAddress, Calls, Type = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')')
| top maxnode by Calls desc;
let frominternet = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> '' and FlowDirection_s == 'I' and FlowStatus_s=='A'
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where PublicIPAddress =~ ipaddress and DestIP_s <> PublicIPAddress
| summarize Calls = count() by DestIP_s, PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s
| project sourceIp = PublicIPAddress, targetIP = DestIP_s, Calls, Type = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')')
| top maxnode by Calls desc;
let links = union outtointernet, frominternet;
let Nodes = outtointernet 
| project Id = sourceIp, Name = sourceIp, Kind = 'VNet' 
| union (
outtointernet 
| project Id = targetIP, Name = targetIP, Kind = 'Internet' 
) 
| union ( 
frominternet
| project Id = sourceIp, Name = sourceIp, Kind = 'Internet' 
) 
| union ( 
frominternet
| project Id = targetIP, Name = targetIP, Kind = 'VNet' 
);
Nodes
| union (links)
content.title: Allowed Traffic Graph for public IP
Check foe IP address details

content.query:
let AccountActivity_byIP = (v_IP_Address:string){
    AzureActivity
    | where Caller != '' and CallerIpAddress =~ v_IP_Address
    | summarize Account_Aux_StartTime = min(TimeGenerated), 
      Account_Aux_EndTime = max(TimeGenerated), 
      Count = count() by 
      Caller, TenantId
    | top 10 by Count asc nulls last 
    | extend UPN = iff(Caller contains '@', Caller, ''), Account_AadUserId = iff(Caller !contains '@', Caller,'')
    | extend Account_Name = split(UPN,'@')[0] , Account_UPNSuffix = split(UPN,'@')[1]
    | project Account_Name, Account_UPNSuffix, Account_AadUserId, Account_AadTenantId=TenantId, Account_Aux_StartTime , Account_Aux_EndTime 
    };
    AccountActivity_byIP('{ipaddress}')
content.title: Azure Operations from this IP

content.query:
let GetMostPrevUsersbyIP = (v_IP_Address:string){
SigninLogs
| where IPAddress =~ v_IP_Address
| extend RemoteHost = tolower(tostring(parsejson(DeviceDetail['displayName'])))
| extend OS = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser
| extend StatusCode = tostring(Status.errorCode), StatusDetails = tostring(Status.additionalDetails)
| extend State = tostring(LocationDetails.state), City = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend info = pack('AppDisplayName', AppDisplayName, 'ClientAppUsed', ClientAppUsed, 'Browser', tostring(Browser), 'IPAddress', IPAddress, 'ResultType', ResultType, 'ResultDescription', ResultDescription, 'Location', Location, 'State', State, 'City', City, 'StatusCode', StatusCode, 'StatusDetails', StatusDetails)
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated), count(), Account_Aux_info = makeset(info) by RemoteHost , UserDisplayName, tostring(OS), UserPrincipalName, AADTenantId, UserId
| top 10 by count_ desc nulls last 
| project Account_Aux_StartTimeUtc = min_TimeGenerated, Account_Aux_EndTimeUtc = max_TimeGenerated, RemoteHost, UserDisplayName, OS, UserPrincipalName, AADTenantId, UserId, Account_Aux_info
| project-rename Account_UnstructuredName=UserPrincipalName, Account_DisplayName=UserDisplayName, Account_AadTenantId=AADTenantId, Account_AadUserId=UserId, Account_Host_UnstructuredName=RemoteHost, Account_Host_OSVersion=OS
};
// change <Address> value below
GetMostPrevUsersbyIP('{ipaddress}')
content.title: AAD signing from this IP

content.query:
let ipaddress = '{HostIP}';
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> ''
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where   SrcIP_s =~ ipaddress or DestIP_s =~ ipaddress
| summarize Calls = count() by SrcIP_s, DestIP_s , PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s, FlowDirection_s
| project Calls, SourceIP = iff(SrcIP_s<>'',SrcIP_s,PublicIPAddress), DestinationIP = iff(DestIP_s<>'',DestIP_s,PublicIPAddress), Protocol = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')') ,Directory = iff(FlowDirection_s=='I','In','Out'), Statis = iff(FlowStatus_s=='A','Allowed','Denied')
| top 100 by Calls desc

let ipaddress = '{HostIP}';
let threshold = 10;
let maxnode = 10;
let outtointernet = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where FlowDirection_s == 'O' //and PublicIPs_s <> ''
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where  SrcIP_s =~ ipaddress and PublicIPAddress <> SrcIP_s and FlowStatus_s =~ 'A'
| summarize Calls = count() by SrcIP_s, PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestIP_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s
| project sourceIp = SrcIP_s, targetIP = PublicIPAddress, Calls, Type = strcat(L7Protocol_s, '(' ,toint(DestPort_d),')')
| where Calls > threshold
| top  maxnode by Calls desc;
let frominternet = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where FlowDirection_s == 'I' //and PublicIPs_s <> ''
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where DestIP_s =~ ipaddress and DestIP_s <> PublicIPAddress and FlowStatus_s =~ 'A'
| summarize Calls = count() by DestIP_s, PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, SrcIP_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s
| project sourceIp = PublicIPAddress, targetIP = DestIP_s, Calls, Type = strcat(L7Protocol_s, '(' ,toint(DestPort_d),')')
| where Calls > threshold
| order by Calls desc
| top  maxnode by Calls desc;
let links = union outtointernet, frominternet;
let Nodes = outtointernet 
| project Id = sourceIp, Name = sourceIp, Kind = 'VNet' 
| union (
outtointernet 
| project Id = targetIP, Name = targetIP, Kind = 'Internet'
) 
| union ( 
frominternet
| project Id = sourceIp, Name = sourceIp, Kind = 'Internet'
) 
| union ( 
frominternet
| project Id = targetIP, Name = targetIP, Kind = 'VNet' 
)
| distinct Id, Name, Kind;
Nodes
| union (links)

content.title: Top process in Syslog
Syslog Message Details

content.query:
let IPsFromRareLocations = (s_Account_Name:string){
let LocationPrevalence =
SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName has s_Account_Name
| extend v_Account_Name = UserPrincipalName
| extend Account_Name = case(
// Handles mixed use scenario of NTDomain\AccountName@UPNSuffix
v_Account_Name has '@' and v_Account_Name has '\\', tostring(split(tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '\\')[1]),'@')[0]),
v_Account_Name has '@', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '@')[0]),
v_Account_Name has '\\', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '\\')[1]),
v_Account_Name
)
| project-rename Account_AadUserId = UserId
| extend FullLocation = strcat(Location,'|', LocationDetails.state, '|', LocationDetails.city)
| summarize ConnectionCount = count() by FullLocation, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, Account_Name, Account_AadUserId;
LocationPrevalence
| summarize make_list(IPAddress), make_list(FullLocation), make_list(ConnectionCount), dcount(FullLocation), totalActivity = sum(ConnectionCount) by UserPrincipalName, Account_AadUserId
| mvexpand Location = list_FullLocation, ConnectionCount = list_ConnectionCount, IPAddress = list_IPAddress
| extend Location = tostring(Location), ConnectionCount = toint(ConnectionCount), IPAddress = tostring(IPAddress)
| extend percentOfActivity = 100*round(todouble(ConnectionCount)/totalActivity,4)
| where percentOfActivity < 10
| project UserPrincipalName, Account_AadUserId, IPAddress, Location, ConnectionCount, percentOfActivity
| sort by percentOfActivity asc, ConnectionCount desc
| top 10 by percentOfActivity asc
| extend IP_Location_Country = tostring(split(Location,'|')[0]), IP_Location_Region = tostring(split(Location,'|')[1]), IP_Location_City = tostring(split(Location,'|')[2])
| extend Account_Aux_info = pack('PercentOfActivity', percentOfActivity, 'ConnectionCount', ConnectionCount)
| parse UserPrincipalName with Account_NTDomain '\\' *
| project Account_UnstructuredName = UserPrincipalName, Account_NTDomain,  Account_AadUserId, IP_Address = IPAddress, IP_Location_Country, IP_Location_Region, IP_Location_City, Account_Aux_info
};
// Where <Name> is the UserName such as John from John@contoso.com, <UPNSuffix> is the domain such as contoso.com from John@contoso.com and <AadUserId> is the GUID assigned in AAD to the user
IPsFromRareLocations('{accountname}')
content.title: AAD user login (UPN name required)

content.query:
let GetAllHostsbyAccount = (v_Account_Name:string){
SigninLogs
| extend v_Account_Name = case(
v_Account_Name has '@', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '@')[0]),
v_Account_Name has '\\', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '\\')[1]),
v_Account_Name
)
| extend targetaccount = iff(v_Account_Name<>'',v_Account_Name,'administrator')
| where UserPrincipalName contains targetaccount
| extend RemoteHost = tolower(tostring(parsejson(DeviceDetail['displayName'])))
| extend OS = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser
| extend StatusCode = tostring(Status.errorCode), StatusDetails = tostring(Status.additionalDetails)
| extend State = tostring(LocationDetails.state), City = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend info = pack('UserDisplayName', UserDisplayName, 'UserPrincipalName', UserPrincipalName, 'AppDisplayName', AppDisplayName, 'ClientAppUsed', ClientAppUsed, 'Browser', tostring(Browser), 'IPAddress', IPAddress, 'ResultType', ResultType, 'ResultDescription', ResultDescription, 'Location', Location, 'State', State, 'City', City, 'StatusCode', StatusCode, 'StatusDetails', StatusDetails)
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated), Host_Aux_info = makeset(info) by RemoteHost , tostring(OS)
| project min_TimeGenerated, max_TimeGenerated, RemoteHost, OS, Host_Aux_info
| top 10 by min_TimeGenerated desc nulls last 
| project-rename Host_UnstructuredName=RemoteHost, Host_OSVersion=OS, Host_Aux_StartTime=min_TimeGenerated, Host_Aux_EndTime=max_TimeGenerated
};
// change <Name> value below
GetAllHostsbyAccount('{accountname}')
content.title: AAD Login Host per AAD user

inputs.name: DSM_emailbody
inputs.value:
威胁发生时间

@{convertFromUtc(items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['EventTime'],'China Standard Time','yyyy年MM月dd日 HH:mm:ss')}

威胁唯一

@{items('For_each')?['Id']}

威胁类型(cat)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['cat']}

威胁来源

DSM

威胁名称(name)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['name']}

威胁等级(sev)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['Alert_severity']}

扫描类型(msg)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['msg']}

引擎执行动作(act)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['act']}

受影响主机(dvc/dvchost)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['dvc']}

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['dvchost']}

恶意软件路径(filePath)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['filePath']}

恶意软件动作(TrendMicroDsMalwareTarget)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['TrendMicroDsMalwareTarget']}

恶意软件动作类型(TrendMicroDsMalwareTargetType)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['TrendMicroDsMalwareTargetType']}

威胁可行性(TrendMicroDsDetectionConfidence)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['TrendMicroDsDetectionConfidence']}

威胁的可能类型(TrendMicroDsRelevantDete ctionNames)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['TrendMicroDsRelevantDetectionNames']}

事件内容(desc)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['description']}

其他信息

文件MD5(TrendMicroDsFileMD5)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['TrendMicroDsFileMD5']}

文件SHA256(TrendMicroDsFileSHA256)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['TrendMicroDsFileSHA256']}

基础LEEF2.0格式(2.0|供应商|产品|版本|事件ID|选项卡|扩展名)

@{items('loop_DSM_security_events')?['rawmesssage']}

 

字典：

CEF扩展字段

LEEF扩展字段

名称

描述

cn1

cn1

主机标识符

客户端计算机内部唯一标识符

cn1label

cn1label

主机ID

字段cn1的名称标签

cn2

cn2

文件大小

隔离文件的大小。只有选中客户端/设备的“直接转发”时，才能包括此扩展名。

cn2label

cn2label

文件大小

字段cn2的名称标签

filePath

filePath

文件路径

恶意软件文件的位置

act

act

行动

由防恶意软件引擎执行的动作。可能的值包括： denyAceess ，Quarantine ，Delete，Pass，Clean，Terminat and Unspecified。

msg

msg

信息

扫描的类型。可能的值是：Realtime，Scheduled and Manual

dvc

dvc

设备地址

cn1的ipv4地址，如果源是ipv6地址或hostname（使用devhost代替），则不会显示

dvchost

dvchost

设备主机名称

cn1的主机名或ipv6地址。如果源是ipv4地址（使用dvc字段代替），则不会显示

TrendMicroDsTags

TrendMicroDsTags

事件标记

分配给服务器深度安全防护系统事件的标记

TrendMicroDsTenant

TrendMicroDsTenant

租户名称

服务器深度安全防护系统租户

TrendMicroDsTenantId

TrendMicroDsTenantId

租户ID

服务器深度安全防护系统租户ID

TrendMicroDsMalwareTarget

TrendMicroDsMalwareTarget

目标

恶意软件正试图去更改的文件，进程或注册表项（如有）。如果恶意软件试图改变多个文件，则该字段将包含值"multiple". 只有可疑活动监控和未授权的变更监控器在该字段都有相应值

TrendMicroDsMalwareTargetType

TrendMicroDsMalwareTargetType

目标类型

恶意软件正试图去更改的文件，进程或注册表项（如有）。如果恶意软件试图改变多个文件，则该字段将包含值"multiple".只有可疑活动监控和未授权的变更监控器在该字段都有相应值。

TrendMicroDsFileMD5

TrendMicroDsFileMD5

文件MD5

文件的MD5哈希

TrendMicroDsFileSHA256

TrendMicroDsFileSHA256

文件SHA256

SHA256 文件的散列

TrendMicroDsDetectionConfidence

TrendMicroDsDetectionConfidence

威胁可行性

该文件与恶意软件模型匹配的紧密度

TrendMicroDsRelevantDetectionNames

TrendMicroDsRelevantDetectionNames

威胁的可能类型

机器学习预测性的将分析结果与其他已知威胁进行比较后，指出文件中包含的最可能威胁类型（以半角“;”隔开）

sev

严重性

事件的严重程度。1是最不严重，10是最严重

cat

分类

类别

name

名称

事件名称

desc

描述

事件描述.防恶意软件使用事件名称作为描述

body.Subject: 安全监控告警 - HIDS Security Patch Alert-@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['risk_name']}-@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['Alert_severity']}

severity

cves

CVE编号

cvss_score

CVSS评分

serv_impact

1: 有业务影响，0：无业务影响

inputs.name: HIDS_emailbody
inputs.value:
威胁发生时间(datatime)

@{convertFromUtc(items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['EventTime'],'China Standard Time','yyyy年MM月dd日 HH:mm:ss')}

威胁唯一

@{items('For_each')?['Id']}

威胁类型(event_type)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['event_type']}

威胁来源

HIDS

威胁名称(event_name)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['event_name']}

威胁等级(event_level)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['Alert_severity']}

受影响主机

host_name: @{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['host_name']}

internal_ip: @{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['internal_ip']}

external_ip: @{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['external_ip']}

系统类型(os)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['OS']}

主机业务组(group_name)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['group_name']}

主机唯一ID(Comid | group | agent_id)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['comid']} | @{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['group']} | @{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['agent_id']}

事件内容(event_content)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['event_content']}

事件详细(url)

@{items('loop_HIDS_security_events')?['url']}

 

字典：

字段名

名称

说明

datatime

发生时间

事件记录时间戳格式，长度为10位

host_name

主机名

Host信息，表示agent所在主机的主机名

internal_ip

内网IP

Host信息，表示agent所在主机的内网IP

external_ip

外网IP

Host信息，表示agent所在主机的外网IP

group_name

业务组

对于次级业务组给出其上级业务组的全部信息，例如：group_name="业务组/子业务组"、group_name="青藤公司/武汉组/产品组/产品测试"

group

主机业务组ID

主机业务组的ID信息，可标识主机的业务组

agent_id

主机agentID

主机agent的ID信息，可唯一标识主机

comid

公司ID

主机所属公司的ID信息，可标识该主机所属的用户

OS

操作系统

Windows/Linux

event_type

事件类型

告警事件的事件类型，用于区分不同功能的事件

event_name

事件中文名

告警事件类型的中文名称

event_level

事件等级

告警事件的事件等级，存在danger（高）、alert（中）和info（低）三个等级，用于标记不同危险程度的事件

event_content

事件内容

告警事件的具体内容，为一段组装好的事件说明

url

产品链接

产品中与事件对应功能的链接，链接将跳转至功能

body.Subject: 安全监控告警 - 蜜罐 - @{items('loop_honeypot_events')?['event_type_display_name']} - @{items('loop_honeypot_events')?['risk_level']}

inputs.name: emailbody
inputs.value:
威胁发生时间

@{variables('EventTime')}

威胁唯一

@{items('For_each')?['Id']}

威胁类型

@{items('For_each')?['Category']}

威胁来源

Sentinel

威胁名称

@{items('For_each')?['Rule']}

威胁等级

@{items('For_each')?['Severity']}

受影响资源

@{variables('affected resource form')}

规则说明

@{items('For_each')?['Description']}

所属订阅

@{variables('SubscriptionName')} - @{variables('subscriptionId')}

inputs.name: affected resource form
inputs.value: ResourceID : Resource Link

inputs.body:
sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where pid_s =~ "@{items('For_each')?['Id']}"
| project pid_s, TimeGenerated, rulename_s
| join 
(sentinelscanreportdetails_CL) on $left.pid_s==$right.pid_s
| project details = todynamic(details_s)
| evaluate bag_unpack(details)
| extend EventTime = column_ifexists('EventTime','@{items('For_each')?['TimeGenerated']}')
| evaluate narrow()
| order by Row
| project Name = Column, Value
| where Name !in~ ('timestamp','TimeGenerated') and Value != ''

sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where pid_s =~ "@{items('For_each')?['Id']}"
| project pid_s
| join 
(sentinelscanreportdetails_CL) on $left.pid_s==$right.pid_s
| project details = todynamic(details_s)
| evaluate bag_unpack(details)

//look for last Windows Security Alerts only
let timeframe= @{parameters('interval')}m;
sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where count_d != 0 and TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*), repeated = count() by rulename_s, Category, query_s,severity_s, description_s,  pid_s
| project TimeGenerated, Rule = rulename_s,  Description =description_s,Category, Severity = severity_s, repeated, Query = query_s, TimeSpan = timespan_s, Id = pid_s, url= column_ifexists('url_s','https://portal.azure.cn')
